item.title: Ep. #015 - Throwing a Wedding Party that Guests Won't Hate part 2
item.description: This is the thrilling follow up to last week's episode where we delved too deep into the minds of guests. Who knows what we awoke in the darkness? Your guests know. They know it well. This week we moved away from the ceremony and onto the reception, the real party.
item.content:encoded:
This is the thrilling follow up to last week's episode where we delved too deep into the minds of guests. Who knows what we awoke in the darkness? Your guests know. They know it well. This week we moved away from the ceremony and onto the reception, the real party.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #014 - Throwing a Wedding Party that Guests Won't Hate part 1
item.description: We talk about what upsets guests at weddings. There's no point in throwing a party if your guests aren't going to have a good time.
item.content:encoded:
We talk about what upsets guests at weddings. There's no point in throwing a party if your guests aren't going to have a good time.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #013 - Picking Your Wedding Party
item.description: Some people might tell you that there are a lot of rules to follow when picking the wedding party. We are not those people. In this episode we dive deep into the madness that is picking your wedding party.
item.content:encoded:
Some people might tell you that there are a lot of rules to follow when picking the wedding party. We are not those people. In this episode we dive deep into the madness that is picking your wedding party.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #012 - Do I Have to Go to My Stepson's Wedding?
item.description: If you don't get along with your stepson and he only ever hits you up when he wants money, do you have to go to his out of state wedding?
item.content:encoded:
If you don't get along with your stepson and he only ever hits you up when he wants money, do you have to go to his out of state wedding?

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #011 - How Not to Be a Crappy Wedding Guest
item.description: We're addressing some of the biggest wedding faux pas in this episode and giving advice on how you can avoid making those same mistakes, so that you're not a crappy wedding guest.
item.content:encoded:
We're addressing some of the biggest wedding faux pas in this episode and giving advice on how you can avoid making those same mistakes, so that you're not a crappy wedding guest.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #010 - Ring Shaming
item.description: If your ring doesn’t live up to expectations, what should you do? Should you ever mention the size of someone’s diamond in their ring? What is okay to say to other engaged people?
item.content:encoded:
If your ring doesn’t live up to expectations, what should you do? Should you ever mention the size of someone’s diamond in their ring? What is okay to say to other engaged people?

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #009 - The Dreaded Guest List
item.description: Who can you cut from your wedding guest list? Who should you cut? How do you rank your friends? Is it even human to think about this?
item.content:encoded:
Who can you cut from your wedding guest list? Who should you cut? How do you rank your friends? Is it even human to think about this?

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #008 - 2019 Wedding Trends
item.description: What are the latest and hippest trends? What trends never seem to go away? What trends would it be nice to see disappear into the abyss of time?
item.content:encoded:
What are the latest and hippest trends? What trends never seem to go away? What trends would it be nice to see disappear into the abyss of time?

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #007 - Lessons We've Learning in 10 Years of Marriage
item.description: This week Steve and Jenn are discussing an article published on the website self.com about some lessons one writer has learned about marriage.
item.content:encoded:
This week Steve and Jenn are discussing an article published on the website self.com about some lessons one writer has learned about marriage.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #006 - How To Ghost Your Vendors
item.description: Ghosting your wedding vendors might feel tempting, but it can cause bigger headaches later. In this episode, we share why disappearing isn’t the best move and what to do instead.
item.content:encoded:
Ghosting your wedding vendors might feel tempting, but it can cause bigger headaches later. In this episode, we share why disappearing isn’t the best move and what to do instead.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #005 - Even Wedding Planners Need a Wedding Planner with Jillian Zilch of Frame Worthy Events?
item.description: Jillian Zilch of Frame Worth Events talks about becoming a wedding planner, what went wrong at her own wedding, and why a wedding planner would hire a wedding planner.
item.content:encoded:
Jillian Zilch of Frame Worth Events talks about becoming a wedding planner, what went wrong at her own wedding, and why a wedding planner would hire a wedding planner.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #004 - Should You Hire a Planner or Coordinator for Your Wedding?
item.description: Jenn and Steve talk about the pros and cons of wedding planners and coordinators in this wedding. They also share some stories of times they've witnessed planners and coordinators saving the day.
item.content:encoded:
Jenn and Steve talk about the pros and cons of wedding planners and coordinators in this wedding. They also share some stories of times they've witnessed planners and coordinators saving the day.

item.title: Ep. #003 - Vacations and Honeymoons
item.description: This episode is all about vacations and honeymoons.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep. #002 - Finding Your Vendors
item.description: In this episode, Jenn and Steve talk about how to find and choose your vendors for your wedding!

item.title: Ep. #001 - What Should You Do When You're First Engaged?
item.description: In the pilot episode of Wedded, hosts Jennifer and Steven Van Elk briefly introduce themselves and then talk about what you should do when you first get engaged.
item.content:encoded:
